name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan is home to the oldest company in the world, Kongo Gumi, established in 578 AD.

name: Canada
interestingFact: Canada has the longest coastline in the world, stretching over 202,080 km.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is the only country in South America where Portuguese is the official language.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to 21 of the world's 25 most venomous snakes.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is the largest economy in Europe and the fourth-largest in the world.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy, with over 900 million eligible voters.

name: Mexico
interestingFact: Mexico City is sinking by about 10 inches each year due to excessive groundwater extraction.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world, attracting over 89 million tourists annually.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Egypt is home to one of the oldest civilizations, with the pyramids dating back over 4,500 years.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving different branches of government.
